thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Overall, the ease of ordering online, the pricing and the selection far exceeded my experience on other optical websites. The selection was far more up-to-date with styles and the pricing often beat the competitors by $20-40, Customer service and char function experience was excellent and definitely customer focused. The only reason I am not sing SmartBuy 5 stars is that twice I selected and paid for eyeglasses frames that I found out afterwards were on back order. I would like to see their inventory display an item is on back order so that you can choose at that time to re-select another pair. Here is what IS excellent. With one day if ordering, I found out my frames were on back order and they offered me a 5% discount if I wanted to re-select another frame. Thanks for being so customer focused SmartBuy Glasses USA!
